name: Star Dodgers - Pico 8 1k Jam 2022
description:
This is my first ever 1k jam game, it was made in about 2 hours and is fairly simple - however I re-learnt the flow of coding in pico 8 (i had about 20 tabs open and was using pico 8 in the browser)  The code is just normal code without any art or sounds, resulting in the the amount of characters being higher than it should but other than that it's a simple game I made in pico 8!

Pico 8 edu version (source code / if embed doesn't work)
